features: Versatile wear: With subtle debossed branding, this crew neck loves hiking, traveling and city life
Light warmth: The soft cotton touch fabric provides just the right amount of warmth
Easy comfort: With a regular fit, this crew is really comfy and easy to wear on its own or with layers
Regular fit: On tops and bottoms, Regular fit is a wider fir than active fit, but slimmer than relaxed fit
AdvancedSkin Warm: AdvancedSkin technical fabrics improve body comfort by keeping you dry, warm and protected when you need it and where you need it
